VIII.i.1.B.1.j
.
Metastasis of a Cancer and Presumptive SC Under 38 CFR 3.307(a)
Do not establish presumptive SC on the basis of herbicide exposure under
38 U.S.C. 1116
and
38 CFR 3.307(a)
for a cancer listed in
38 CFR 3.309(e)
when medical evidence factually shows that the cancer developed as the result of metastasis of a cancer located at a primary site that is not recognized by the VA as associated with herbicide exposure.
Note
:Â  Such evidence constitutes affirmative evidence to rebut the presumption of SC based on herbicide exposure.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Ratings for Disabilities Associated with Herbicide Exposure
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
